original_text: Then Pharaoh summoned Moses and Aaron. “This time I have sinned,” he said to them. “The Lord is in the right, and I and my people are in the wrong.
korean_text: 바로가 사람을 보내어 모세와 아론을 불러 그들에게 이르되 이번은 내가 범죄하였노라 여호와는 의로우시고 나와 나의 백성은 악하도다

sentences.original_text: Then Pharaoh summoned Moses and Aaron
The Lord is in the right
and I and my people are in the wrong
